resources.string: Welcome to Where in the World !
This tutorial will guide you through each stage of the game.
Click the OK Button to Start
This is the Difficulty screen. Click on a Difficulty to select how challenging you would like the game to be. The number of Categories available to you depends on the Difficulty you choose.
This is the Categories screen. Unlocking Categories requires Tokens *, which you will slowly gain as you play through the game, or you can purchase them. Select a Category to continue.
This is the Levels screen. Every Category has 5 levels and each Level is slightly harder than the last. Select a Level to continue.

This is the Locations screen. Every Level has 6 randomly chosen Locations. To PASS a Level, you must get the Required number of Points *, this will unlock the next Level. To COMPLETE a Level you must finish all the Locations, and for this you will get some Bonus Tokens *. Click on any one of the 6 Locations to start.

Welcome to the main Game screen ! You start every Location looking at Google Street View, and your mission is to Guess where you think you are in the world. Have a look around in Street View, then when you are ready Click the Switch to Map button *.

This is the Google Map screen. You can click on the Switch to Street View Button * to go back to the Street View screen if you would like to look around some more. Tap anywhere on the Map to add a Guess Marker * and then Click on *
So you have made your Guess, but are you sure this is where the Answer is ? Perhaps you need a Hint. Clicking * will take you to the Hints screen. Let\'s go to the Hints screen now.

This is the Hints screen. Hints cost Tokens *, and the higher the Token cost the better the Hint. Continue by selecting a Hint. You will be shown a description about the hint and then you will be returned to the Map. From there you can make another Guess.
You have done well to come this far. Have some free Tokens to get you started !

This is the Post Game dialog.
 * returns to the Map
 * returns to the Locations
 * goes to the Wikipedia page
To return to the game from Wikipedia, just press back on your phone.

So that\'s all there is to it ! Now you are back at the Locations screen, so choose another Location and continue your journey. There\'s lots of weird and wonderful places to visit so start exploring !
